channel.title: Spammers
channel.description:
We have started to give extra attention to spammers now. So far we have only pmed spammers and gave them a warning but from nowone we will punish the spammers. And when I say punish it will be the hardest punishment the spammer can get.
[b]This is your first and your last warning.[/b]
Heres what moparisthebest.com rules says about spamming
2. We don't make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use "you" not "u", we use "why" not "y" etc. 3. We don't make posts that don't contain any useful information. Posts like "cool", "lol", "yeah" and "I agree" don't contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of offtopic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all. 3.1. We don't "bump" or double post.

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

daycrawler:

Should we lock this thread? Otherwise, It’s just going to become of full of spam anyways… I like the idea, and I’ll have to watch my posts more carefully… Thanks…

Stop spamming in this topic then.
Hehe, I got a warning sigh but oh well, my warning was sent because I posted “rofl” on one of my daily spam posts

Read full topic

Ok, got it, if it has to be spam, make it good spam

Read full topic

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

depending on the spam. I will prefer the postcounts and reputations reseting. Everyone should know that posts like “k” and “lol” are 110% spam. People can be sarcastic and funny thats not what I mean. But there has to be somekind of control in this. Creating examples is the best way to teach to every single user how we dont tolerance spamming.

Read full topic

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @USMC USMC
item.description:
@USMC wrote:

sounds a bit harsh me me… to be honest surely this post would be considered as spam under the rules, it is not useful nor funny?

Read full topic

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Spammers are warned individually, and you only get one warning now.

A Permenant ban will occur as the hardest punishment. And on your hostname as well, so no proxies can be used to enter the site.

Read full topic

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @Algas Algas
item.description:
@Algas wrote:

We have started to give extra attention to spammers now. So far we have only pmed spammers and gave them a warning but from nowone we will punish the spammers. And when I say punish it will be the hardest punishment the spammer can get.

This is your first and your last warning.

Heres what moparisthebest.com rules says about spamming

  1. We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc.
  2. We don’t make posts that don’t contain any useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of offtopic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
    3.1. We don’t “bump” or double post.

Read full topic
